GreenVesting

GreenVesting

Description

GreenVesting is a crowdfunding platform based in Germany that focuses on debt-based investments in the green energy industry. Founded in 2012, GreenVesting has established itself as a reliable and experienced service partner for the financing of energy projects, green project development, and energy-efficient real estate. The platform primarily operates in the German market and thus primarily offers its services in the German language. Its website, https://greenvesting.com/, provides users with detailed information about the platform and its investment opportunities. To become an investor on GreenVesting, individuals are required to make a minimum investment of 100 EUR. When investing in projects listed on the platform, investors can expect a competitive advertised return ranging between 3.4% and 7%. GreenVesting specializes in developing, financing, and operating photovoltaic projects. It aims to contribute to the growth of green energy by connecting renewable energy projects with investors who are passionate about supporting environmentally friendly initiatives. Overall, GreenVesting offers a unique opportunity for individuals in Germany to invest in the green energy sector and support the development of sustainable projects in the country.

Who can invest

Itâ€™s becoming increasingly widespread for investors to be interested not only in the possible returns but the collateral social or environmental impact. In other words people want their investment choices to be aligned with their values.

Goparity

Portugal

GoParity is a crowdfunding platform based in Portugal that focuses on debt-based P2P lending. It was founded in 2017 and primarily caters to the SME industry, with a specific emphasis on sustainability, green energy, social causes, farming, and maritime projects. The platform offers an opportunity for individuals and institutions to invest in sustainable projects and earn competitive returns starting from a minimum investment of â‚¬5. GoParity aims to simplify the investment process and connect citizens who are interested in supporting environmentally friendly initiatives. With a multilingual interface available in English, Spanish, and Portuguese, the platform ensures accessibility to a wider audience. Investors can browse through the available projects and choose the ones they are interested in contributing to. The returns on investment are advertised at 0.06, making it an attractive option for individuals looking to diversify their investment portfolio and support impactful ventures. GoParity welcomes both private investors and institutional investors, providing an inclusive investment opportunity for anyone interested in supporting sustainable projects in various sectors. By investing as little as â‚¬5, investors can contribute towards the overall loan value of the projects they choose to support. Overall, GoParity offers a user-friendly and accessible platform for individuals and institutions to invest in sustainable projects and make a positive impact on the environment and society.

Industry:SMESustainabilityGreen energySocial causeFarmingMaritime
Type:DebtP2P lending

CrowdedHero

Latvia

CrowdedHero is a crowdfunding platform founded in 2019 and based in Latvia. It offers a unique investment opportunity for individuals and businesses interested in equity-based financing. The platform focuses on a range of industries including real estate, startups, small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), green energy, and farming. One of the key distinguishing features of CrowdedHero is its grown-up approach to equity crowdfunding. This approach is built on a foundation of experience and innovation, ensuring that investors have access to high-quality investment opportunities and can make informed decisions. The platform is available in both English and Latvian, making it accessible to a broader audience. It offers an easy-to-use website where investors can browse through various investment opportunities and make investments starting from a minimum amount of 100 EUR. CrowdedHero advertises a return rate of 0.2, which indicates that investors have the potential to earn a positive return on their investments. This, combined with the diverse range of industries that the platform caters to, offers investors the opportunity to diversify their investment portfolio and potentially earn significant returns. CrowdedHero welcomes both natural persons and legal entities to invest on its platform, catering to a wide range of investors. With its solid foundation and innovative approach, CrowdedHero aims to provide a reliable and transparent crowdfunding platform for those interested in equity-based financing.

Industry:Real estateStartupsSMEGreen energyFarming
Type:Equity

Spreds

Belgium

Spreds is a crowdfunding platform based in Belgium, founded in 2011. It offers investment opportunities in various industries including real estate, startups, SMEs, green energy, and health & science. The platform supports both equity and loan crowdfunding campaigns, specifically targeting projects aiming to raise funds between â‚¬50,000 and â‚¬1,000,000. Spreds works by connecting campaigns with multiple types of investors such as Business Angels (BAs), Venture Capitalists (VCs), Family Offices, Funds, and others. Private individuals as well as companies are eligible to invest on the platform. The platform supports three languages: English, Dutch, and French, making it accessible to a wide range of users. With a minimum investment requirement of â‚¬100, Spreds aims to make crowdfunding accessible to a diverse investor base. Unfortunately, the advertised return on investments is not specified, so potential investors might need to review individual campaign opportunities to understand the potential returns. Overall, Spreds.com provides a platform for individuals and companies in Belgium to invest in a range of industries, supporting both equity and loan crowdfunding campaigns. With its diverse investor network, it aims to facilitate fundraising for campaigns looking for larger funding amounts.

Industry:Real estateStartupsSMEGreen energyHealth & Science
Type:Equity

bettervest

Germany

Bettervest is a German crowdfunding platform founded in 2012 that focuses on financing energy efficiency projects. The platform offers equity and mini-bonds investment options to individuals interested in supporting green energy initiatives, health and science projects, social causes, education, and farming. One of the primary motivations behind Bettervest's establishment was to empower citizens to finance energy efficiency projects. The platform recognizes that energy efficiency not only saves money but also conserves resources and reduces CO2 emissions. Bettervest believes that the benefits of energy efficiency should not be limited to large corporations but also extend to individual investors. Bettervest's website is available in both German and English, making it accessible to a broader audience. The minimum investment amount on the platform is 50 EUR, allowing virtually anyone interested in supporting sustainable projects to participate. Advertised returns on investments range from 6% to 8%, providing potential financial benefits to investors in addition to supporting environmentally friendly initiatives. The platform's diverse range of investment opportunities includes projects in green energy, health and science, social causes, education, and farming. This broad selection allows investors to align their investments with their personal interests and values. Bettervest welcomes all individuals who wish to invest, emphasizing the inclusivity of their platform. By connecting investors with impactful projects, Bettervest aims to facilitate the transition to a more sustainable future.

Industry:Green energyHealth & ScienceSocial causeEducationFarming
Type:EquityMini-bonds
